description.value:
You can move, make a ranged attack, and move again before your foes can react.

Prerequisites: Dex 15, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.K1DuZQv4CKQHxnIk]{Mobility (Combat)}, base attack bonus +4.

Benefit: As a full action, you can move up to your speed and make a single ranged attack at any point during your movement. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.MBNI94tbMoqizPUk]{Trick Attack (Ex)} class feature, you can take your movement from trick attack at any time during a trick attack (see page 93) with a ranged weapon (instead of only before).

Normal: You can move only before or after making a ranged attack, not both.
